EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Atlanta
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Atlanta. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Atlanta, GA Friday, June 3rd, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12pm Sessions 12pm – 1pm Lunch 1pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/atlanta?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-Atlanta]]>
Location: Tech on Fifth @ Technology Square <[[http://techonfifth.org/]]> Georgia Tech Venture Center 75 Fifth Street NW Atlanta, GA 30308 Room: Hodges (Suite 335) Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/75+5th+St+NW,+Atlanta,+GA+30308/@33.7773754,-84.3914938,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x88f50466e53acd15:0xa9df96221daacfdc!8m2!3d33.7773754!4d-84.3893051]]>
Parking: Parking deck is located directly behind the building 815 Williams St. NW Atlanta, GA 30308
Questions? Contact Jamie De Martini at jdemartini@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jdemartini@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
